text: Any information obtained from any laboratory blood test required under § 46- 417 shall be regarded as confidential by each person, agency, or committee who obtains, transmits, or receives such information.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 30-120.

1973 Ed., § 30-122.

DC CODE § 46-420

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Confidential character of blood test information.
